permafrost.tundra.lang

Class BytesHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.lang.BytesHelper

  • public final class BytesHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with byte[] objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private BytesHelper()
      Disallow instantiation of this class.

      Normalizes the given String, byte[], or java.io.InputStream object to a byte[].

      • transcode

        public static byte[] transcode(byte[] data,
                               java.nio.charset.Charset sourceCharset,
                               java.nio.charset.Charset targetCharset)
                        throws java.nio.charset.CharacterCodingException
        Transcodes character data from one character set to another.
        Parameters:
        data - The character data to be transcoded.
        sourceCharset - The character set of the given data.
        targetCharset - The character set to transcode the give data to.
        Returns:
        The transcoded character data.
        Throws:
        java.nio.charset.CharacterCodingException - If any transcoding error occurs.

      • transcode

        public static byte[] transcode(byte[] data,
                               java.nio.charset.CharsetDecoder decoder,
                               java.nio.charset.CharsetEncoder encoder)
                        throws java.nio.charset.CharacterCodingException
        Transcodes character data from one character set to another.
        Parameters:
        data - The character data to be transcoded.
        decoder - The character set decoder to decode the given data.
        encoder - The character set encoder to encode the returned data.
        Returns:
        The transcoded character data.
        Throws:
        java.nio.charset.CharacterCodingException - If any transcoding error occurs.
